description: All the weights and entries for the Grand National at Aintree on 5 April.
title: Grand National 2025: Weights and entries for Aintree race
title_page: Grand National 2025: Weights and entries for Aintree race - BBC Sport
maintext:
The field for the 2025 Grand National at Aintree on 5 April has been confirmed.
This year's race will have a maximum of 34 runners.
Last year's winner I Am Maximus carries top weight while the final horse to make the cut is the Gordon Elliott-trained Duffle Coat.
Four reserves have been nominated - Harry Redknapp's Shakem Up'arry, veteran Roi Mage, Favori de Champdou and Fantastic Lady - with the deadline for non-runners to be replaced by these horses set at 13:00 on Friday, 4 April.
